thread.title: Gail Youngblood
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by Gail Youngblood

author: Gail Youngblood
title: Gail Youngblood
text: Excellent products and excellent customer service. We have purchased four pair of binoculars, a spotting scope, a tripod and many attachments. I DO recommend this company to everyone who asks for info on optics. Our vortex scope is a hit on birding trips because we can adjust it so easily for taller and shorter people and we are often asked where we bought it.
